content: these knit gloves for the family are so toasty you ll be wishing for the winter fun to begin stitched in patons classic wool simply choose your color and knit in rounds doing increases decreases knit and purl techniques this beginner-level project is great for the novice or for the more experienced maker looking for a relaxing project materials patons® classic wool worsted™ 3 5 oz/100 g 194 yds/177 m pink quartz 77744 or dark gray mix 00225 6/12 s/m l 1 2 2 ball s sizes to fit child 6/12 yrs adult s/m-adult l
